page.title: 12Claire's Day, Newcastle
page.content:
Claire is 9 and goes to school in {Byker, Newcastle upon Tyne.}
Monday 24th June {My day I said "Ta-ra" to my mam and went to school and got on with maths until playtime. After playtime we read our books. We went home for our dinners. We all came back and did more work. After all that I went home. I got my bike out and played on it for half an hour, then put it in and went for Terri Hoggins. We played with Lisa, Lisa, Vicky, Katherine and Goff. We all went to the lifts and got chased by the caretaker and his dog. Me and Terri got away and we went to the top of{Raby Street.}My mam came up for me. I had to go to my mam's friends. I saw her{engagement cake}it was very big. After that I went home and went to bed.
